>So said james_khu on 4/19/2003 --------------------
>Hi 
>
>I am a gradua=
te student at a local university. I was just given a 
>research project on =
how to do both unit testing and load testing of 
>EJB. They told me to expl=
ore the possibility of using JUnit to unit 
>test EJB.

This is definitely =
an interesting project. I hope that the members of this group do not give y=
ou too much of the answers up front. If you search the web, you can find a =
great deal on the subject.

My suggestion to you is to start by defining fo=
r yourself (and for us) what the purpose of "unit tests" is. Describe the k=
ind of tests you envision writing -- describe what you expect those unit te=
sts to verify. Once you do this, writing the actual code is not at all diff=
icult.

Take care.
